name: Harihari Seal Paradise
storyline: The player joins Harihari and her friends in this sticker activity game, which includes animated sticker pages, special occasions stickers, greetings stickers, poster stickers, and a music session. Players can also make their own custom stickers, changing the proportions of objects, selecting the background, adding borders, and implementing some animations with a variety of art tools.
summary: A sticker-designing game for the Casio Loopy. Players can paint and stamp unique creations to print on the Loopy's built-in sticker printer.

videos.name: Game Intro
